actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to convey property to the Greater Yuma Port Authority of Yuma County, Arizona, for use as an international port of entry.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to convey to the Greater Yuma Port Authority for fair market value certain Arizona lands for use as an international port of entry and related activities, subject to specified covenants and conditions, including certain reservations of: (1) rights-of-way for ditches, canals, and well fields; (2) water rights; (3) rights-of-way and easements; and (4) gas, oil, metals, and mineral rights.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Bureau of Reclamation, to convey property to the Greater Yuma Port Authority of Yuma County, Arizona, for use as an international port of entry.
